fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the metric.

fields.name: desc
fields.description: Description of the metric.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tags associated with the metric.

fields.name: metricType
fields.description: Type of the metric.

fields.name: value
fields.description: Current value the metric.

fields.name: summary
fields.description: If the metric is configured with statistics config, then the calculated statistics of the metric.

records.name: Metric
records.description: This represents the generic metric record that can represent both counter and gauge.

fields.name: percentile
fields.description: The percentile of the reported value.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the percentile.

records.name: PercentileValue
records.description: This represents the percentile value record.

fields.name: timeWindow
fields.description: The time window in which variation of the values are considered.

fields.name: mean
fields.description: The average value within the time window.

fields.name: max
fields.description: The max value within the time window.

fields.name: min
fields.description: The min value within the time window.

fields.name: stdDev
fields.description: The standard deviation value within the time window.

fields.name: percentileValues
fields.description: The percentiles values calculated wihtin the time window.

records.name: Snapshot
records.description: This represents the snapshot of the statistics calculation of the gauge.

fields.name: percentiles
fields.description: The percentiles that needs to be calculated.

fields.name: timeWindow
fields.description: The time window (in milli seconds) in which variation of the values are considered.

fields.name: buckets
fields.description: The number of buckets used in the sliding time window.

records.name: StatisticConfig
records.description: This represents the statistic configuration that can be used to instatiate gauge metric.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the counter metric.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the counter metric.

fields.name: metricTags
fields.description: Tags associated with the counter metric.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the Counter instance.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description:
Description of the Counter instance. If no description is provided, the the default empty string
will be used.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key/value pair of Tags. If no tags are provided, the default nil value will be used.

methods.name: init
methods.description:
This instantiates the Counter object. Name field is mandatory, and description and tags fields
are optional and have its own default values when no params are passed.

returnParameters.description:
Returns error if there is any metric registered already with the same name
but different parameters or in a different kind.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Register the counter metric instance with the Metric Registry.

methods.name: unregister
methods.description: Unregister the counter metric instance with the Metric Registry.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The amount by which the value needs to be increased. The amount is defaulted as 1 and will be
used if there is no amount passed in.

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Increment the counter's value by an amount.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the counter's value to zero.

returnParameters.description: The current value of the counter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the Counter instance.

parameters.name: desc

Description of the Counter instance. If no description is provided, the the default empty string
will be used.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key/value pair of Tags. If no tags are provided, the default nil value will be used.

initMethod.description:
This instantiates the Counter object. Name field is mandatory, and description and tags fields
are optional and have its own default values when no params are passed.

returnParameters.description:
Returns error if there is any metric registered already with the same name
but different parameters or in a different kind.

otherMethods.name: register
otherMethods.description: Register the counter metric instance with the Metric Registry.

otherMethods.name: unregister
otherMethods.description: Unregister the counter metric instance with the Metric Registry.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The amount by which the value needs to be increased. The amount is defaulted as 1 and will be
used if there is no amount passed in.

otherMethods.name: increment

otherMethods.description: Resets the counter's value to zero.

returnParameters.description: The current value of the counter.

classes.name: Counter
classes.description: This represents the metric type - counter, that can be only increased by an integer number.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the counter metric.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the counter metric.

fields.name: metricTags
fields.description: Tags associated with the counter metric.

fields.name: statisticConfigs
fields.description:
Array of StatisticConfig objects which defines about the statistical calculation
of the gauge during its usage.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the Gauge instance.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description:
Description of the Gauge instance. If no description is provided, the the default empty string
will be used.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key/value pair of Tags. If no tags are provided, the default nil value will be used.

parameters.name: statisticConfig
parameters.description:
Statistics configurations array is used for statistics calculation. In case if empty
statistics configurations array is passed, then statistics calculation will be disabled.
If nil () is passed, then default statistics configs will be used for the statitics
calculation.

methods.name: init
methods.description:
This instantiates the Gauge object. Name field is mandatory, and description, tags, and statitics config fields
are optional and have its own default values when no params are passed.

returnParameters.description:
Returns error if there is any metric registered already with the same name
but different parameters or in a different kind.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Register the gauge metric instance with the Metric Registry.

methods.name: unregister
methods.description: Unregister the counter metric instance with the Metric Registry.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The amount by which the value of gauge needs to be increased.
The amount is defaulted as 1.0 and will be used if there is no amount passed in.

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Increment the gauge's value by an amount.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The amount by which the value of gauge needs to be decreased.
The amount is defaulted as 1.0 and will be used if there is no amount passed in.

methods.name: decrement
methods.description: Decrement the gauge's value by an amount.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The instantaneous value that needs to be set as gauge value.

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: Sets the instantaneous value for gauge.

returnParameters.description: The current value of the gauge.

Array of the statistics snapshots.
If there is no statisticsConfigs provided, then it will be nil.

methods.name: getSnapshot
methods.description: Retrieves statistics snapshots based on the statistics configs of the gauge.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the Gauge instance.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description:
Description of the Gauge instance. If no description is provided, the the default empty string
will be used.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key/value pair of Tags. If no tags are provided, the default nil value will be used.

parameters.name: statisticConfig
parameters.description:
Statistics configurations array is used for statistics calculation. In case if empty
statistics configurations array is passed, then statistics calculation will be disabled.
If nil () is passed, then default statistics configs will be used for the statitics
calculation.

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
This instantiates the Gauge object. Name field is mandatory, and description, tags, and statitics config fields
are optional and have its own default values when no params are passed.

returnParameters.description:
Returns error if there is any metric registered already with the same name
but different parameters or in a different kind.

otherMethods.name: register
otherMethods.description: Register the gauge metric instance with the Metric Registry.

otherMethods.name: unregister
otherMethods.description: Unregister the counter metric instance with the Metric Registry.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The amount by which the value of gauge needs to be increased.
The amount is defaulted as 1.0 and will be used if there is no amount passed in.

otherMethods.name: increment

otherMethods.name: decrement
otherMethods.description: Decrement the gauge's value by an amount.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The instantaneous value that needs to be set as gauge value.

otherMethods.description: Sets the instantaneous value for gauge.

returnParameters.description: The current value of the gauge.

If there is no statisticsConfigs provided, then it will be nil.

otherMethods.description: Retrieves statistics snapshots based on the statistics configs of the gauge.

classes.name: Gauge
classes.description:
This represents the metric type - gauge, that can hold instantaneous, increased or decreased value
during the usage.

parameters.name: tagKey
parameters.description: Key of the tag

parameters.name: tagValue
parameters.description: Value of the tag

returnParameters.description: An error if an error occurred while attaching tag to System Metrics

functions.name: addTagToMetrics
functions.description: Add a key value pair as a tag to system metrics.

parameters.name: tagKey
parameters.description: Key of the tag

parameters.name: tagValue
parameters.description: Value of the tag

parameters.name: spanId
parameters.description: Id of span to which the tags should be added or -1 to add tags to the current active span

returnParameters.description: An error if an error occurred while attaching tag to the span

functions.name: addTagToSpan
functions.description: Add a key value pair as a tag to the span.

parameters.name: spanId
parameters.description: Id of span to finish

returnParameters.description: An error if an error occurred while finishing the span

functions.name: getAllMetrics
functions.description: Retrieve all registered metrics including default metrics from the ballerina runtime, and user defined metrics.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the metric to lookup.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key/value pair tags that associated with the metric that should be looked up.

functions.name: lookupMetric
functions.description: Retrieves the specific metric that is described by the given name and tags.

parameters.name: spanName
parameters.description: Name of the span

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to be associated to the span

functions.name: startRootSpan
functions.description: Start a span with no parent span.

parameters.name: spanName
parameters.description: Name of the span

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to be associated to the span

parameters.name: parentSpanId
parameters.description: Id of the parent span or -1 if parent span should be taken from system trace

functions.name: startSpan
functions.description: Start a span and create child relationship to current active span or user specified span.

modules.summary:
This module provides apis for observing Ballerina services.
Ballerina supports Observability out of the box. This module provides user api's to make Ballerina Observability more flexible for the user.

modules.description: This module provides apis for observing Ballerina services.
